title: I DESPERATELY Wanted to Love This... - AyaNeo Air
description:
A portion of this video is sponsored by Artlist. Sign up for Artlist now with my custom link and get two months free when you purchase an annual subscription at https://lmg.gg/Artlist

The handheld PC space has been crazy over the last couple of years with the Steam Deck, GPD WIN, and AyaNeo vying for a spot in your backpack. The AyaNeo Air Pro is here, but can a smaller chassis and a beautiful 1080p OLED screen make up for its hardware shortcomings?

Discuss on the forum: https://linustechtips.com/topic/1454482-i-desperately-wanted-to-love-this/

Check out the Aya Neo Air: https://lmg.gg/ZmmWY

Check out the Aya Neo Air Pro: https://lmg.gg/ZmmWY
